amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Secretary of Defense to carry out a study on the weapons systems being produced for the Department of Defense that were originally designed to fight the Cold War and the former Soviet Union.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 21 printed in House Report 110-151 to require the Secretary of Defense to issue a report on the continued use, need, relevance, and cost of weapons systems designed to fight the Cold War and the former Soviet Union.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 119 - 303 (Roll no. 366).
